title: Interactive Exoplanet Predictor
description: Interactive Exoplanet Predictor uses machine learning to predict the number of exoplanets that a star would have based on several variables, including radius, surface gravity, age, temperature, etc. A 3D model of the predicted star system is generated based on each new set of inputs.

title: HTML5 Platformer
description: 2D platformer game written in pure JavaScript using the HTML5 canvas API. I wrote the physics engine, controls, and particle rendering 100% from scratch.
